categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Trux Zissu was to be posted as governor on Delantine by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. He was accompanied by his son Stuart Zissu, 4B-X, R2-D2, and C-3PO from Yavin 4 in the Timespan. While traveling, the Timespan was ambushed and boarded by stormtroopers. Trux shot the first two stormtroopers then surrendered in order to give the droids and Stuart time to escape in escape pod 4.
Trux was described as muscular and fit, typical of a fighter, with silver hair.
